nodes.text: This bunker was owned by Darth Skotia on the Sith Empire's capital of Dromund Kaas during the Cold War. It served as his warehouse where his guard protected artifacts and relics. During Darth Nox's apprenticeship to Darth Zash, the young apprentice was assigned to infiltrate the bunker and acquire a tablet to help them defeat Darth Skotia himself. A task which Nox completed successfully.
The bunker first appeared in Star Wars: The Old Republic, a massively multiplayer online roleplaying game (MMORPG) by BioWare released on December 20, 2011.
